articles.title: Brunei Sultan bids goodbye to 650 soldiers of Royal Gurkha Rifles - The Star Online
articles.description: BANDAR SERI BEGAWAN (Borneo Bulletin/Asia News Network): Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah bid farewell to 650 soldiers and family members from the 2nd Battalion, Royal Gurkha Rifles (2RGR) at their base in Seria, Belait District on Tuesday (June 14).
